You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a series of colorful Tetris-like shapes arranged in a sequence. Starting from the left, there is a purple cross, followed by a green 'F', two interlocking orange shapes resembling the number '8', and two stacked pink 'T's. The background is white, and there is no additional context to suggest the purpose of the shapes or the actions to be taken with them.

The "FREE" is oriented upward and is centrally positioned in the image with a light pink circle to its right. The background is light gray, providing a neutral backdrop that makes the colors of the blocks stand out.
